snippet: The police said there was nothing in the officer’s departmental record to indicate that she was troubled.
abstract: Off-duty New York City Police Officer Rosette M Samuel fatally shoots boyfriend Dason Peters and their infant son before killing herself inside Samuels's Flatbush, Brooklyn, apartment.

byline.original: By WENDY RUDERMAN and NATE SCHWEBER

lead_paragraph: The police said there was nothing in the officer’s departmental record to indicate that she was troubled.

headline.seo: Officer Killed Boyfriend and Son in Murder-Suicide, Police Say
headline.main: Off-Duty Officer Killed Boyfriend, Their Year-Old Son and Then Herself, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Off-Duty Officer Killed Boyfriend, Their Year-Old Son and Then Herself, Police Say
